description: An AI agent manages a stock portfolio for a high-net-worth individual, automatically rebalancing it based on market conditions and risk tolerance.  This involves monitoring market data, executing trades, and generating reports.
initial_goal: Maintain a diversified stock portfolio for client X, targeting a 7% annual return with a maximum risk tolerance of 10%.  Rebalance the portfolio quarterly or when market deviations exceed a 5% threshold.
